channel.title: Mountainview CRC's Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle:
Each Sunday Mountainview Christian Reformed Church holds a morning and afternoon service. We publish the sermon audio after each service to be enjoyed at your convenience.
Mountainview Christian Reformed Church is located in Grimsby, Ontario. Our ...
channel.itunes:author: Mountainview CRC
channel.itunes:summary:
Each Sunday Mountainview Christian Reformed Church holds a morning and afternoon service. We publish the sermon audio after each service to be enjoyed at your convenience.
Mountainview Christian Reformed Church is located in Grimsby, Ontario. Our goal as a church is to Reach Up to God in worship, Reach In to disciple, and Reach Out to the community with God's love.
channel.description:
Each Sunday Mountainview Christian Reformed Church holds a morning and afternoon service. We publish the sermon audio after each service to be enjoyed at your convenience.
Mountainview Christian Reformed Church is located in Grimsby, Ontario. Our goal as a church is to Reach Up to God in worship, Reach In to disciple, and Reach Out to the community with God's love.

item.title: Renewing Our Minds about Mental Illness
item.description:
This morning we welcome Rev. Mark Stephenson, the Director of Disability Concerns for the Christian Reformed Church in North America since July 2006. Previously he served in two congregations in Michigan. He and his wife have four children.
The Text for today is Romans 12:1-2
